DataElement.preferredName: Intervention Trial Study Protocol Document Record Verification Date ISO21090.TS.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A pre-clinical or clinical study in human beings in which individuals are assigned by an investigator based on a protocol to receive specific interventions. The individuals are then followed and biomedical and/or health outcomes are assessed.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:A rule which guides how an activity should be performed.:An organized collection of records that describe a particular body of data._Anything (e.g., a document) providing permanent evidence of or information about past events.:Supported or established by evidence or proof.:The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen._Quantity specifying a point on the axis of natural time.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Intervention Trial Study Protocol Document Record Verification Date
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A pre-clinical or clinical study in human beings in which individuals are assigned by an investigator based on a protocol to receive specific interventions. The individuals are then followed and biomedical and/or health outcomes are assessed.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:A rule which guides how an activity should be performed.:An organized collection of records that describe a particular body of data._Anything (e.g., a document) providing permanent evidence of or information about past events.:Supported or established by evidence or proof.:The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A pre-clinical or clinical study in human beings in which individuals are assigned by an investigator based on a protocol to receive specific interventions. The individuals are then followed and biomedical and/or health outcomes are assessed.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:A rule which guides how an activity should be performed.:An organized collection of records that describe a particular body of data.

Concepts.definition: A pre-clinical or clinical study in human beings in which individuals are assigned by an investigator based on a protocol to receive specific interventions. The individuals are then followed and biomedical and/or health outcomes are assessed.
A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.
A rule which guides how an activity should be performed.
A physical object, or electronic counterpart, that is characterized by containing writing which is meant to be human-readable.

Property.preferredDefinition: Anything (e.g., a document) providing permanent evidence of or information about past events.:Supported or established by evidence or proof.:The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

Concepts.definition: Anything (e.g., a document) providing permanent evidence of or information about past events.
Support or establish by evidence or proof.
The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Quantity specifying a point on the axis of natural time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Health Informatics - Harmonized data types for information interchange

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happened. (NCI)
